layout.meta.description: Intuityvi anoniminė vertinimo sistema klientų aptarnavimo srityje
layout.meta.keywords: vertinimas,apklausa,klientų aptarnavymas,klientų aptarnavimo tyrimas, slaptas pirkėjas, aptarnavimo tyrimai
layout.meta.author: beirate
web.index.beHeard.content: Beirate Customer Service Research (BCS) tool - enables fast easy and anonymous feedback in single click from customers experiencing our clients’ customer service. Customers simply scan their option of pre-formulated answers with their smartphone.
web.index.anonymousAndSecure.content: Customers response rate is higher when giving feedback anonymously. We protect customers’ data as well as take care that votes are correct and unique.
web.index.multiplatformsystem.content: Feedback from customers can be provided with any smartphone in the market. They just simply scan their answer option using any “QR code reader” application on any device. And feedback is taken - simple as that.
web.index.weCare.content: Restaurant, coffee-shop, retailer or etc. - where customers face our feedback tool - care about customer service and want to deliver best services, wants to improve and strive for perfection.
web.index.tryNow.contentPart3: (if you don’t have one, you’ll find one on any app store), face camera to one of your option. And that is it! Simple as that. Magic happens behind the scenes - vote is being processed in our internal complex backend system. After that, our customers get structural and clear statistics.
web.index.detailStatistics.content: We provide access in our system to detailed and clear statistics for feedback you get from your customers. You can use different filtering online or download data for your custom analysis needs.
